short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns your browser into a slideshow/kiosk which can be remotely managed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To make a remotely managed slideshow in combination with chrome kiosk mode:
* each tab may have an own delay in addition to a general delay is configurable.
* also a timeframe is possible. E.g. during working hours specific tab.
* also the update frequency is remotely configurable.

Perfectly handy for single board computers.
